params._tplAddress: the svg data as a string

params._manager: the address of the svg manager

returns.data_: the svg data as a string

createSVG(string).notice: add a new svg template and return the template address to the caller

svgAddress(string).notice: get the svg address of the given svg name. does not mean the file exists.

svgString(string).notice: get the svg data of the given svg name as a string

svgs().notice: get all the svgs stored in the contract

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to create and manage SVG templates
